    • Uses of Command in zuul.timerunner.pkg_commands

      Subclasses of Command in zuul.timerunner.pkg_commands 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AleaCommand
      Alea command, to control the RoomRandomizer.
      class  BackCommand
      Command to go back in the previous rooms.
      class  DropCommand
      Command to drop player's item in the current Room.
      class  EatCommand
      Command to eat and edible item
      class  GiveCommand
      Command to give player's item to non player character.
      class  GoCommand
      Command the player use to move arround the level.
      class  HelpCommand
      Command show some help and the list of valid commands.
      class  ItemsCommand
      Command to show the player's inventory.
      class  LookCommand
      Command to look at the player's surroundings.
      class  QuitCommand
      Command to qui the game.
      class  TakeCommand
      Command to take an item in the current room.
      class  TeleportCommand
      Command to use the Beamer item.
      class  TestCommand
      Command to open a test file that contains commands.
